覝字的基本解释

覝
lián
察看。

覝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《廣韻》力鹽切，平鹽，來。］
“廉1”的古字。
察视。

覝字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【見字部】　覝； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1135第11
【唐韻】力鹽切【集韻】離鹽切，?音廉。【說文】察視也。【演繁露】《周禮》廉能之類，諸家雖訓廉爲察，常疑理不相附，因閱漢高帝詔：廉問，有不如吾詔者，以重論之。顏氏曰：廉字本作覝，其音同，乃知廉之爲察，本覝字也，有覘眎之義。○按《說文》本作覝。从見㶣聲。俗作覝，非。《字彙補》一作?、?，亦非。

覝字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
覝字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Youji 1] [See the word department] 　覝; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 1135 to 11
[Tang Yun] Cut the salt with strength [Ji Yun] Cut the salt from the salt, and the sound is clean. [Said the text] Inspection also. [Play Fanlu] "Zhou Li" Lian Neng and the like, although the scholars are admonishing honesty for inspection, often doubts are not attached, because of reading Han Gaodi's edict: Lian asked, if there are those who are inferior to my edict, reiterate it. Yan Shi said: The original character for Lian is called 覝, and its pronunciation is the same, but it is to know Lian for inspection, and the original character for 覝 also has the meaning of Zang Liao. ○According to "Said Wen", this is a composing. Cong see the sound. Vulgar as 覝, non. "Zihuibu" is a ??, ??, nor is it.
